rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0001
rows.name:
We don't know Metsu's location right
now, and we have a little time until
Hugo gets back.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0002
rows.name:
We'll have to take care of
those Gogols so that the repairs for
Lett Bridge can continue.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0003
rows.name:
You're right. We should make that our
immediate objective.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0004
rows.name: So, these Gogols... Are they tough?

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0005
rows.name:
One of the fiercest species in this area,
for sure.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0006
rows.name:
I bet if I got serious with 'em,
they'd fold in no time.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0007
rows.name:
Hey, be serious. If you really went at it,
you'd probably destroy what's left of
the bridge.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0009
rows.name: ...Uhm, well, OK. Maybe it is true.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0010
rows.name:
You would blast it right off into the
horizon!

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Lett Bridge is a vital link to the
capital. You can't really get in
or out without it.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0012
rows.name:
So we've really got to get
rid of those Gogols.

rows.label: campfev11_380_150_msg0013
rows.name:
But I'll have to ask you to go a little
easy on them, Hikari.
